subsection-1.heading: Ricoma presents the<br class="hidden sm:block" /> Ricoh Ri 1000
subsection-1.paragraph: Ricoma has partnered with Ricoh to bring you the latest and greatest direct to garment printing technology along with Ricoma's superior training and support. With this combination of quality and affordability, you can start your printing business with confidence all for as low as $249/month and free shipping.

subsection-2.heading: Professional-Level<br class="hidden sm:block"/> Performance at an<br class="hidden sm:block" /> Affordable Price
subsection-2.paragraph: Get even more for less. Winner of the 2019 SGIA Product of the Year Award, the Ri 1000 is an ideal solution for new businesses, print shops looking to expand their offerings, and e-commerce businesses with mid-volume production. With fast speeds, high image quality, more accurate colors, and automated setup and maintenance, the Ri 1000 easily outperforms its competition.
